autoHideAfterLaunched.title: Hide client window after desktop/application launched
autoHideAfterLaunched.description: Set to true if the VMware Horizon client window should be hidden once a connection is established with a remote session

broker-history.title: VMware Horizon Server connection history
broker-history.description: Pre-populate VMware Horizon Server connection history to add additional server addresses beyond the default

defaultBroker.title: Default VMware Horizon Server
defaultBroker.description: The default VMware Horizon Server address for the client: https://server.org.com/broker/xml

trustedServers.title: Trusted Servers
trustedServers.description: Define VMware Horizon Servers to mark as trusted

certificateVerificationMode.title: Certificate checking mode
certificateVerificationMode.description: Determine how the client proceeds when it cannot verify the security certificate on the VMware Horizon server.

enum_titles: Warn before connecting to untrusted servers
Do not check for valid certificates when connecting to servers

isSSLProxyAllowed.title: SSL Proxy mode
isSSLProxyAllowed.description: Set to true to allow certification verification using secondary connections via an SSL Proxy. This setting works with Blast and tunnel connections, however it does not work with PCoIP.

autoConnectForSingleCert.title: Automatically select certificate
autoConnectForSingleCert.description: If set to true Horizon Client will automatically use a local certificate or certificate on a connected smart card to connect. Does not work if multiple certificates are present

promptedUSBPrintingServicesInstall.title: Prompted USB Printing Services Install
promptedUSBPrintingServicesInstall.description: Set to true to hide the USB Printing Services installation prompt from the user

kAutoCheckForUpdates.title: Automatically Check For Updates
kAutoCheckForUpdates.description: Set to true to automatically check for available updates

kAutoDownloadForUpdates.title: Automatically Download Updates
kAutoDownloadForUpdates.description: Set to true to automatically download updates if they are available

kAllowDataSharing.title: Allow Data Sharing
kAllowDataSharing.description: Set to true to share application usage, statistics, and telemetry data with VMware

kNeverRememberUserADInfo.title: Remember username and domain
kNeverRememberUserADInfo.description: Set to true to PREVENT VMware Horizon Client from saving the username and domain for connections. Set to false for VMware Horizon Client to remember the username and domain used with each connection

promptSharingChecked.title: Drive Sharing dialog
promptSharingChecked.description: Set to true to hide the Drive Sharing from the user when a remote session begins
